name: Monthly Business Review (MBR)
description: Compile and present a comprehensive monthly business review covering key metrics, performance vs. targets, trends, and strategic insights. The MBR is a critical leadership communication that drives monthly decision-making.

currentProcess.description: Request data from department heads (sales, ops, finance, product)
painPoints: Late submissions delay the whole process

currentProcess.description: Consolidate data from multiple sources into master spreadsheet

painPoints: Formatting takes as long as analysis
Choosing the right visualization for each metric

currentProcess.description: Write narrative explaining performance and trends
Create executive summary and key takeaways
painPoints: Distilling hours of work into 1 page

aiProcess.description: Consolidate and validate data from sources
aiProcess.toolRationale: Gemini handles structured data consolidation and can flag inconsistencies
tips: Export each source to CSV with consistent date formats
Include column headers - don't assume AI knows your schema

aiProcess.toolRationale: Gemini can perform calculations and provide plain-English explanations
aiProcess.expectedOutput: Metrics table with variances, trends, and preliminary explanations
tips: Provide prior period and target values
Ask for 'significance assessment' - is this variance meaningful?

aiProcess.toolRationale: Claude excels at synthesizing data into strategic narratives
aiProcess.expectedOutput: Section-by-section narrative with insights and 'so what' analysis
tips: Provide business context (what happened this month)
Ask for both positive and concerning trends

aiProcess.toolRationale: ChatGPT writes concise, punchy executive summaries
aiProcess.expectedOutput: 1-page executive summary with key metrics and action items
tips: Request 'headline' format - the one thing leadership should know

aiProcess.toolRationale: ChatGPT writes professional reports quickly; you'll refine
aiProcess.expectedOutput: Complete MBR draft with all sections
tips: Ask for placeholder notes for charts

aiProcess.description: Review, refine, and add visualizations (manual + AI)
aiProcess.toolRationale: Human judgment on accuracy; AI assists with rewrites
aiProcess.expectedOutput: Polished report ready for stakeholder review

aiProcess.toolRationale: Use AI for quick iterations based on feedback

whyItMatters: The MBR is often the primary mechanism for leadership alignment on business performance. A late, inaccurate, or unclear MBR undermines decision-making and erodes trust in the analytics function.
commonMistakes: Data dumps without insight - don't just show numbers, explain them
Burying the lead - put the most important finding first
Inconsistent methodology - changing how you calculate metrics destroys comparability
No 'so what' - every metric should answer 'why should I care?'
Over-relying on AI narratives - add your expert judgment and context
tips: Build a template prompt you update each month with new data
Create a 'context log' throughout the month to capture events that explain variances
Ask AI to generate Q&A prep: 'What questions might the CEO ask about this?'
Use AI to create multiple versions: detailed for ops, summary for board
Keep AI outputs as drafts - your review catches errors and adds nuance
sources: Perplexity Research - Business review best practices
Aditya Goyal AAA Experience - Monthly retention/attrition reporting
